root.name: NightSky
root.description: IntroductionNightSky is a puzzle/platform game by Nicalis (known for the Wii port of Cave Story) for the PC and Nintendo's Wiiware service. Nicklas Nygren ( Nifflas) is the director, game and level designer for the game. His trademark ambient-feel for games is apparent in the mood of the game.GameplayIn NightSky the player rolls around a ball interacting with the environment. The direction and speed the ball is rolling depends on how the players is holding the Wii remote.The game is entirely enemy-free and the experience is solely meant to be that of exploration.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP or newerProcessor: Intel Atom or aboveMemory: 512MB RAMGraphics: 3D graphics cardDirectXÂ®: N/AHard Drive: 100MBExternal Linkshttp://nifflas.ni2.se/?page=NightSky (Official Webpage)
